extends org.rakiura.draw.figure.RectangleFigure

Field Detail

DELAY

public static long DELAY
The time to display the rectangle in a different color if it is involved in an event.

Constructor Detail

CPNTransitionFigure

public CPNTransitionFigure()
Creates a new TransitionFigure with a new Transition to listen to. The name and ID are set to a new unique ID. Initilaly no attributes are set to a value.

See Also:
CPNTransitionFigure(Transition)

CPNTransitionFigure

public CPNTransitionFigure(Transition aTransition)
Creates a new TransitionFigure with the provided Transition to listen to. Name and annotations of the transition are displayed. The transition is a green rectangle with the size equal to size Above the rectangle the name is displayed in bold. The display of the name can be switched off. The guard and action can be displayed as a symbol (default) or as the actual text.

Parameters:
aTransition - a Transition that is to be displayed by this CPNTransitionFigure

getTransition

public Transition getTransition()
Returns the transition that is represented by this figure. WARNING: The actual byte code of the transition may not be equal to the textual representation of the annotations.

Returns:
a Transition represented by this figure.

notify

public void notify(TransitionStartedEvent anEvent)
Event notification. This method makes the transition orange.

Specified by:
notify in interface TransitionListener
Parameters:
anEvent - a TransitionStartedEvent value

notify

public void notify(TransitionFinishedEvent anEvent)
Event notification. This method turns the transition into its previous colour again.

Specified by:
notify in interface TransitionListener
Parameters:
anEvent - a TransitionFinishedEvent value

notify

public void notify(TransitionStateChangedEvent anEvent)
Event notification. This method makes the transition white if it is enabled, or back to the previous color otherwise.

Specified by:
notify in interface TransitionListener
Parameters:
anEvent - a TransitionStateChangedEvent value

inspect

                       boolean alternate)
Inspects the figure. If alternate is false, it will show/hide the annotations.

Specified by:

Overrides:

Parameters:

alternate - alternate inspection or not?
Returns:
true if inspection is done, false if no figure could be inspected.

release

public void release()
Releases the figures resources. This method is usually called after it has permanently been removed from a drawing. It stops listening to its getTransition().

Specified by:
release in interface org.rakiura.draw.Figure
Overrides:
release in class org.rakiura.draw.AbstractFigure

deReference

public void deReference()
Makes sure that the figure does not listen to a netElement anymore. Use it if a figure is not displayed anymore. e.g. when the drawing is closed.

Specified by:
deReference in interface CPNAbstractFigure
See Also:
CPNAbstractFigure.reReference()

reReference

public void reReference()
Makes sure that the figure does listen to its netElement again. Use it if a figure is displayed again. e.g. when a drawing is redisplayed.

Specified by:
reReference in interface CPNAbstractFigure
See Also:
CPNAbstractFigure.deReference()
